summary: This is an email correspondence from July 16, 2019, regarding an Epstein filing. It includes an attachment titled '2019.07.16 Defense Letter.pdf' and is addressed to the Chief of the Public Corruption Unit at the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Stewart, Crai A.
persons.context: Appears as a recipient of an email regarding an Epstein filing, with an address suggesting association with the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Epstein Filing Correspondence
events.description: An email was sent regarding an Epstein filing, attaching a defense letter.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated July 16, 2019, concerning an Epstein filing.
It includes an attachment titled '2019.07.16 Defense Letter.pdf', suggesting legal correspondence from Epstein's defense team.

The email is addressed to the Chief of the Public Corruption Unit at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, indicating the ongoing legal proceedings involved federal prosecutors.
The recipient 'Stewart, Crai A.' is associated with the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
